Posts.Content: Jun 12, 2017 08:47AM Teddymom9111 wrote: the mammo was done only a few months earlier and nothing came up in it. In terms of cycle I hardly get Periods anymore but I had some spotting so that is when I called and got the appt for the right time. However, I was still spotting a week later which is weird in and of itself. About a month ago I had a week of hot flashes, insomnia and headaches and was certain I was going through the start of menopause (I'm 47). Can dcis stay in the duct if it's measured this big? Could this have been missed? I live in Washington DC and am supposed to have terrific care here but I'm worried it was missed.
Posts.Title: 3.2 cm non mass enhancement - biopsy Wednesday Teddymom9111 dasill

Posts.Content: Jun 12, 2017 12:35PM Teddymom9111 wrote: Thank you both SO much for taking the time to respond. The anxiety has been pretty crippling lately but I am working on it. Reading the success stories on this website helps a lot. Doc - I am having a MRI guided biopsy - thanks for the info on calcifications. None were noted in the report, so I assume they saw none. Thanks again!
